channel.title: Karabiner Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 10.4.8
item.description:
About v10.4.8 Update

  • v10.4.8: __SimultaneousKeyPresses__ has been improved in some corner cases.
  • v10.4.7: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.4.2: Fixed issues: Some Java apps (IntelliJ IDEA) will be crash.
  • v10.4.1: Minor UI update.
Karabiner Web Site
